queries.label: All posts with authors
queries.query: SELECT c.id, c.title, c.author.name, c.views FROM c

queries.label: Posts by specific author
queries.query: SELECT c.title, c.publishedDate, c.views FROM c WHERE c.author.name = 'Sarah Chen'

queries.label: Posts with specific tag
queries.query: SELECT c.title, c.tags FROM c WHERE ARRAY_CONTAINS(c.tags, 'cosmosdb')

queries.label: Posts with comments from Emma
queries.query: SELECT c.title, c.comments FROM c JOIN comment IN c.comments WHERE comment.author = 'Emma Wilson'

queries.label: High engagement posts
queries.query: SELECT c.title, c.views, ARRAY_LENGTH(c.comments) AS comments FROM c WHERE c.views > 2000

queries.label: Posts published in Feb 2024
queries.query: SELECT c.title, c.publishedDate, c.author.name FROM c WHERE c.publishedDate >= '2024-02-01' AND c.publishedDate < '2024-03-01'

queries.label: All comments across posts
queries.query: SELECT c.title, comment.author, comment.text, comment.likes FROM c JOIN comment IN c.comments ORDER BY comment.likes DESC
